metadata.title: Robotics Industry Knowledge Graph
metadata.description: Leading companies in the robotics and automation industry

nodes.name: Tesla
nodes.description: Leading electric vehicle manufacturer developing advanced autopilot systems, humanoid robots (Optimus), and AI-driven manufacturing automation.

nodes.name: Boston Dynamics
nodes.description: Pioneering advanced robotics with dynamic mobility systems. Known for Spot (quadruped robot), Atlas (humanoid), and Stretch (logistics robot).

nodes.name: NVIDIA
nodes.description: Leader in GPU computing and AI platforms. Provides Isaac robotics platform, Omniverse simulation, and Jetson edge AI computing for robotics.

nodes.name: ABB Robotics
nodes.description: Global leader in industrial robots and automation solutions. Specializes in collaborative robots, machine automation, and smart manufacturing systems.

nodes.name: KUKA
nodes.description: German robotics company providing intelligent automation solutions for industries including automotive, electronics, and logistics.

nodes.name: Universal Robots
nodes.description: Pioneer in collaborative robot arms (cobots) designed to work alongside humans safely. Focus on flexible, easy-to-program automation.

nodes.name: FANUC
nodes.description: Japanese robotics giant specializing in CNC systems, industrial robots, and factory automation with AI-enhanced capabilities.

nodes.name: iRobot
nodes.description: Consumer robotics company famous for Roomba vacuum robots and developing home automation solutions with advanced navigation.

nodes.name: Intuitive Surgical
nodes.description: Leader in robotic-assisted minimally invasive surgery with the da Vinci Surgical System, transforming healthcare worldwide.

nodes.name: DJI
nodes.description: World leader in drone technology and aerial imaging systems for consumer, enterprise, and agricultural applications.

nodes.name: Waymo
nodes.description: Alphabet's self-driving technology company developing autonomous vehicle systems with advanced sensor fusion and AI.

nodes.name: Amazon Robotics
nodes.description: Develops mobile robots, automated storage systems, and AI-powered logistics solutions for Amazon's fulfillment centers.
